primaryHeadline: Automated marketing software for personalized local campaigns
primaryCopy: Balihoo's software platform will transform the way you reach consumers at the local level. Our unique, cloud-based technology allows national brands to launch highly efficient, sophisticated campaigns that capture attention through personalized messages. Our software platform empowers you to drive demand, increase sales and target your local customers with precision.
secondaryCopy:
A national brand’s number one marketing tool is local websites. Balihoo’s website solutions help national brands capitalize on local search traffic and generate leads through online forms and trackable local phone calls. Call us or fill out the contact form for more info and a free, live demo.
